headline: OLYMPUS MICROSCOPE STAND
description: StereoZoom Microscope Stand w/ Light Source     Transmitted light StereoZoom microscope stand w/ light source and mechanical stage.   Available only with purchase of Olympus or Nikon StereoZoom Microscope.
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Microscope Parts and Accessories > Stands
specstable:
Manufacturer Olympus
Model SZX-STL
Type Transmitted Light
Other Information

Stand incudes:

  • Olympus Model U-SIC4R right hand mechanical stage with 4"x4" X,Y travel
  • Olympus Model SZX-STAD2 stage adapter
  • Olympus Model SZSTS E-arm

    Light Source:
    Fostec Model 20500 (150 watts) w/ light guide

    Stand will also fit Nikon StereoZoom Microscope

Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.750 in (40.0 cm)
Depth 13.750 in (34.9 cm)
Height 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Power Requirements 115 V 3.0 A 60 Hz
